description: CENSUS_SUBDIVISION_ID: Foreign Key, linking to CENSUS_SUBDIVISION_ID in CEN_CENSUS_SUBDIVISIONS, e.g., 5901022
CENSUS YEAR is the census year that the data is collected. e.g., 2006, 2011.
CLAB_ID: is a Canada Lands Administrative Boundary (CLAB) unique identifier. e.g., 00009. This is a foreign key to WHSE_ADMIN_BOUNDARIES.CLAB_INDIAN_RESERVES.
Band number is the unique identifier assigned to the First Nation by the Federal Government.
Primary name used by First Nation
Secondary name used by First Nation
Nation with which First Nation community is associated
Total population of individuals registered with the First Nation
Total population of individuals registered with the First Nation and living on reserve or Crown lands
Total population of individuals registered with the First Nation and living off reserve or Crown lands
Notes related to matching First Nation to appropriate Census Subdivision
